scripts.scss: mkdir -p dist/ && node-sass --output-style compressed static/scss/style.scss dist/css/style.css
scripts.uglify: mkdir -p dist/ && uglifyjs dist/lib.js -o dist/lib.js -c -m && uglifyjs dist/rts.js -o dist/rts.js -c -m && uglifyjs dist/out.js -o dist/out.js -c -m
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:haskell && npm run clean:dist
scripts.build:js: make build && npm run copy:stackbuild && npm run uglify
scripts.build:css: npm run scss && npm run autoprefixer
scripts.build:dist: mkdir -p dist/ && npm run build:js && npm run build:css
